contentTypes.name: Menu
contentTypes.description: A Menu contains a number of Menu Buttons or other Menus, which will be rendered as drop-downs.

validations.message: The Top Button must be a button linking to a URL or page.  If the menu is a dropdown, this button is visible when it is collapsed.
The items must be either buttons or drop-down menus
The Side Menu must be a Menu

contentTypes.name: Menu Button
contentTypes.description: A Menu Button is a clickable button that goes on a Menu.  It has a link to a Page or a URL.

validations.message: A Menu Button should have a very short text field - ideally a single word.  Please limit the text to 60 characters.
The external link must be a URL like 'https://www.watermark.org/'
The Page Link must be a link to a Page which has a slug.
The icon should start with 'ion-', like 'ion-arrow-down-c'.  See http://ionicons.com/
Hero text should be no longer than 150 characters

contentTypes.name: Section: Video Highlight
contentTypes.description: Highlight a video with some text

contentTypes.name: Faq
contentTypes.description: A faq is a question + answer pair used in the Faq section on a page

contentTypes.name: Page
contentTypes.description: A page describes a collection of sections that correspondto a URL slug

validations.message: This can be a Ministry or Conference.
Must be a hex value (ex: '#EEE' or '#FFAA55')
Must be a hex value (ex: '#EEE' or '#FFAA55')
The program details must be a key and a value separated by a pipe character, '|'.  Example: "Audience | Married Couples"
The ministry website must be a full URL to a separate web page

settings.helpText: (Optional) Select an image to use as the icon instead of using the 'ion icon' and 'text' fields.
A link to an external URL.  Use 'Page Link' to link to other pages on Watermark Resources.
A link to another page on this same site
This text will be the largest text on the screen
This will be displayed in small text above the video title
This text will be subdued beneath the title
This must be an "iframe" or "script" snippet
This will be displayed at the top of the section
This will lead to the list of all items of this type
This will display on the card
What should others associate with this ministry? (ex: "Marriage Enrichment Ministry")
This is only for searching in Contentful and has no bearing on the site
